Description: You create an irritating, damaging sound in the mind of a creature. Make a ranged attack roll against a creature in range, doing psychic damage on a hit. If the natural attack roll is 19 or 20, the target flinches.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
